pages.text: A strange entity that appears near beings that have a high amount of soul energy.

pages.title: Essence of Shadow
pages.text: When slain, they drop some odd 'essences' that seems to suck in light. Perhaps they can be used to create certain items.
Some, who have seen and survived an encounter of one, believed them to be a creation of a $(l:world/crypts)dark and cold place$()...
